languages.text: "Я... не против сопровождать Лорд-капитана. Познание внешнего мира — бесценный опыт, которого лишены те из нас, кто страшится покинуть стены Навис Санктум".
"I... do not mind accompanying the Lord Captain. Experiencing the outside world is an invaluable experience denied to those of us who fear to leave the walls of the Sanctum Navis."
languages.original_text: "Я... не против сопровождать Лорд-капитана. Познание внешнего мира — бесценный опыт, которого лишены те из нас, кто страшится покинуть стены Навис Санктум".

traits.locale_text: "I... do not mind accompanying the Lord Captain. Experiencing the outside world is an invaluable experience denied to those of us who fear to leave the walls of the Navis Sanctum."
"I... do not mind accompanying the Lord Captain. Experiencing the outside world is an invaluable experience denied to those of us who fear to leave the walls of the Navis Sanctum."
"I... do not mind accompanying the Lord Captain. Experiencing the outside world is an invaluable experience denied to those of us who fear to leave the walls of the Navis Sanctum."
"I... do not mind accompanying the Lord Captain. Experiencing the outside world is an invaluable experience denied to those of us who fear to leave the walls of the Navis Sanctum."

languages.text: “我……我不介意陪同舰长大人一起旅行。体验外面的世界是无价的宝贵经历，是那些不愿离开导航者圣所的导航者永远无法体会到的东西。”
languages.original_text: "I... do not mind accompanying the Lord Captain. Experiencing the outside world is an invaluable experience denied to those of us who fear to leave the walls of the Sanctum Navis."

traits.locale_text: “我……我不介意陪同舰长大人一起旅行。体验外面的世界是无价的宝贵经历，是那些不愿离开导航者圣所的导航者永远无法体会到的东西。”

languages.text: « ... Cela ne me dérange pas d'accompagner {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. J'y gagne une expérience inestimable du monde extérieur, alors que bon nombre de mes semblables en ont bien trop peur pour se risquer hors des murs du Sanctum Navis. »
languages.original_text: "I... do not mind accompanying the Lord Captain. Experiencing the outside world is an invaluable experience denied to those of us who fear to leave the walls of the Sanctum Navis."

traits.locale_text: « ... Cela ne me dérange pas d'accompagner {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. J'y gagne une expérience inestimable du monde extérieur, alors que bon nombre de mes semblables en ont bien trop peur pour se risquer hors des murs du Sanctum Navis. »

languages.text: "Ich ... habe nichts dagegen, den Lord Captain zu begleiten. Die Außenwelt zu erleben, ist eine unschätzbar wertvolle Erfahrung, die einem verwehrt bleibt, wenn man sich nicht traut, die Wände des Sanctum Navis zu verlassen."
languages.original_text: "I... do not mind accompanying the Lord Captain. Experiencing the outside world is an invaluable experience denied to those of us who fear to leave the walls of the Sanctum Navis."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... habe nichts dagegen, den Lord Captain zu begleiten. Die Außenwelt zu erleben, ist eine unschätzbar wertvolle Erfahrung, die einem verwehrt bleibt, wenn man sich nicht traut, die Wände des Sanctum Navis zu verlassen."

languages.text: 「あたくしは…ロード・キャプテンに同行しても構いません。外の世界を体験することは、サンクトゥム・ネイヴィスの壁から出ることを恐れているあたくしたちには許されない貴重な経験です」
languages.original_text: "I... do not mind accompanying the Lord Captain. Experiencing the outside world is an invaluable experience denied to those of us who fear to leave the walls of the Sanctum Navis."

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしは…ロード・キャプテンに同行しても構いません。外の世界を体験することは、サンクトゥム・ネイヴィスの壁から出ることを恐れているあたくしたちには許されない貴重な経験です」

languages.text: «No... me importa acompañar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Experimentar el mundo exterior es una experiencia valiosísima que se nos niega a quienes tememos salir del Sanctum de Navegantes».
languages.original_text: "I... do not mind accompanying the Lord Captain. Experiencing the outside world is an invaluable experience denied to those of us who fear to leave the walls of the Sanctum Navis."

traits.locale_text: «No... me importa acompañar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Experimentar el mundo exterior es una experiencia valiosísima que se nos niega a quienes tememos salir del Sanctum de Navegantes».

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan'a eşlik etmek, benim için zorluk teşkil etmez. Navis Kutağı'nın surlarının ardındaki dünyayı keşfetmeye çekinenlerin hiçbir zaman tadamayacağı bir deneyim sunar."
languages.original_text: "I... do not mind accompanying the Lord Captain. Experiencing the outside world is an invaluable experience denied to those of us who fear to leave the walls of the Sanctum Navis."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan'a eşlik etmek, benim için zorluk teşkil etmez. Navis Kutağı'nın surlarının ardındaki dünyayı keşfetmeye çekinenlerin hiçbir zaman tadamayacağı bir deneyim sunar."

languages.original_text: "I... do not mind accompanying the Lord Captain. Experiencing the outside world is an invaluable experience denied to those of us who fear to leave the walls of the Navis Sanctum."
